h1. Defense Shield

The Defense Shield is your personal firewall that handles all incoming and outgoing traffic for your Cloud Space, your routing, port fowards and firewall settings.

New users can find useful info about the Defense Shield in our [Quick Tutorial Guide|Getting Started].
